description:
Update select properties of an existing model.

You can update the following properties:

  - `description` - Model description
  - `readme` - Model README content
  - `github_url` - GitHub repository URL
  - `paper_url` - Research paper URL
  - `weights_url` - Model weights URL
  - `license_url` - License URL

Example cURL request:

```console
curl -X PATCH \
  https://api.replicate.com/v1/models/your-username/your-model-name \
  -H "Authorization: Token $REPLICATE_API_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "description": "Detect hot dogs in images",
    "readme": "# Hot Dog Detector\n\nðŸŒ­ Ketchup, mustard, and onions...",
    "github_url": "https://github.com/alice/hot-dog-detector",
    "paper_url": "https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17639",
    "weights_url": "https://huggingface.co/alice/hot-dog-detector",
    "license_url": "https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/"
  }'
```

The response will be the updated model object with all of its properties.

parameters.description: The name of the user or organization that owns the model.
parameters.name: model_owner

github_url.description: A URL for the model's source code on GitHub.

license_url.description: A URL for the model's license.

paper_url.description: A URL for the model's paper.

readme.description: The README content of the model.

weights_url.description: A URL for the model's weights.

cover_image_url.description: A URL for the model's cover image

github_url.description: A URL for the model's source code on GitHub

is_official.description: Boolean indicating whether the model is officially maintained by Replicate. Official models are always on, have stable API interfaces, and predictable pricing.

license_url.description: A URL for the model's license

owner.description: The name of the user or organization that owns the model

paper_url.description: A URL for the model's paper

run_count.description: The number of times the model has been run

url.description: The URL of the model on Replicate

visibility.description: Whether the model is public or private
